dialogue.User: I want to receive an email notification when there’s new information from the Department of Agriculture.

dialogue.System: Great! To finalize, could you please provide the email address where you’d like to receive notifications from the Department of Agriculture?

dialogue.User: Yes, please send notifications to my email address.

dialogue.System: Okay, and what would you like the subject line and content of this email notification to be?

dialogue.User: I want a simple alert about the strawberries.

Belief State.action_fields_values:
'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries', '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'

dialogue.System: Okay, I understand you want a simple alert about the strawberries. To finalize the email notification, could you provide more details on what specifically should appear in the subject and body?

dialogue.User:
The subject should be 'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries' and the body should say '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'.

dialogue.System: So we've established the email content for the recall notification. Now, what specific query would you like me to use to identify the initial posts triggering this alert?

dialogue.User: The query should be 'Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination'. This will help find relevant information about the open recall.

'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries', '

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'

dialogue.User: I want to receive a notification on my Android device whenever my Cookit cooking program starts.

dialogue.System: Considering the Cookit starting event, do you want to specify a specific ID for this trigger?

dialogue.User: Yes, I would like to receive notifications when any Cookit program starts.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want a notification when any Cookit program starts. But could you clarify which ID are you interested in?

dialogue.User: I’m interested in Cookit programs with ID ‘kitchen’.

dialogue.System: So, when a Cookit program with ID ‘kitchen’ starts, what action would you like me to perform?

dialogue.User: I would like you to play music.
I want to receive tomorrow’s weather report via email.

dialogue.System: Great! And to whom should I send this email and what subject line would you prefer? Also, do you have any specific formatting requests for the email body?

dialogue.User: Just send it to my friend and write "Weather Update" as subject.

dialogue.System: Ok, and what should be the content of this email? Do you want to include specific information or a template for the weather forecast? Also, could you confirm if you would like to specify any fields for sending the email?

dialogue.User: I would like to send the email through Gmail.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've confirmed Gmail as the channel, could you please provide the recipient(s) for the 'To', 'Cc', and 'Bcc' fields, along with a subject and body for the email? Also, do you have a URL for any attachments you’d like to include?

dialogue.User:
To: john.doe@example.com, Cc:, Bcc:, Subject: Tomorrow's Weather in Los Angeles, Body:

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

, Attachment URL: https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf

dialogue.System: You mentioned wanting to know if it will rain tomorrow. But regarding the time and location we discussed initially, are those still correct for checking the forecast?

dialogue.User: Yes, 8:00 AM at latitude 34.0522° N and longitude 118.2437° W is perfect.
I'd like to set up a way to get alerts when something happens.

dialogue.System: Ok, I see you want a push notification when a new photo post with a specific hashtag appears on Facebook. But what details should this notification contain?

dialogue.User: I want the details to be sent through Notifications.

dialogue.System: Considering you want to send a notification via Notifications, how do you envision this notification being structured and delivered from the IFTTT app? What information should it include?

dialogue.User: Just send me an alert when something happens.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want to include the hashtag in the notification. But before we proceed, which service should receive this notification?

dialogue.User: The notification should be sent via the IFTTT app.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we know the notification will come from the IFTTT app, could you tell me what message would you like to include in this notification?

dialogue.User: Just a simple heads-up when something happens.

Belief State.action_fields_values: '☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it\'s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!'

dialogue.System: I understand you want a simple heads-up. However, could you provide the exact text for this notification?

dialogue.User: ''☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it’s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!''

dialogue.System: Considering you’ve provided the message for the notification, and knowing this will come from Weather Underground, when should I send this weather update?

dialogue.User: Every morning at 8 am would be great.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want alerts for tornado and flood warnings via Weather Underground. To complete this setup, could you specify the location for which you’d like to receive these alerts?

dialogue.User: Yes, I would like to receive tornado and flood alerts via Weather Underground.

dialogue.System: Considering you want a report from Weather Underground, how often would you like to receive Today’s weather report?

dialogue.User: I think once a day would be fine.

dialogue.System: Ok, and where do you want to receive this weather report? For instance, a specific city or region?

dialogue.User: I would like today's weather report.

dialogue.System: Great! So you want today's weather report. What time would you like to receive it and for which location?

dialogue.User: I’d like it at 08:00 for London, UK.

Belief State.action_fields_values: '☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it\'s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!'

dialogue.User: I’d like something to happen whenever there's new content and then shared on Twitter.

dialogue.System: Ok, great. Now that I know the RSS feed, could you clarify what kind of item triggers this rule?

dialogue.User: This rule should trigger for any new item and post a tweet with image on Twitter.

dialogue.System: Great! So, when a new item appears in your RSS feed, you want me to post a tweet with an image on Twitter. Could you tell me more about what you’d like the content of that tweet and the accompanying image to be?

dialogue.User: I'd like it to share the article title and maybe a nice landscape photo.

Belief State.action_fields_values: 'Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D'

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want to share an article title and a landscape photo on Twitter. However, could you clarify what exactly should be included in the tweet itself? Should it just be the article title, or something more?

dialogue.User: The tweet should say "Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]". And please use this image: https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've set up the tweet content and image for Twitter, could you tell me what event within Pocket should trigger this action? For instance, saving a new article?

dialogue.User: Yes, I want this to happen every time I save a new article on Pocket.
